name: Cubetly
description:
Cubetly - Fun Cube Game

Welcome to Cubetly . In this game you have a cube and you need to avoid obstacles . Hope you like it!

Discord : https://discord.gg/GrJpNTw

Trello (post idea's): https://trello.com/b/Cqy6Rm1c/cubetly-development

Tips :
1 If the game laggs , minimize the window a bit so the game is like 1/4 of you're pc screen.
2 If your pc don't let you download the game just download it again and when a window popped up just click on read more or something. and then click on download.

Controls

You need to move you're cube with the Q/D or A/D keys

The Q or A key is controlling you're cube to the left

The D Key is controlling you're cube to the right
